reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and comfortable, particularly noting it's not itchy and keeps the neck toasty.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: So soft and long enough in the back to cover your butt. It’s true to size and looks great. Color is a vibrant red and not too heavy. Read more
items.author: Kris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great top!
items.body: Very comfortable and chic top. Fits well, nicely made. Read more
items.author: LizK

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised
items.body: The knit quality and thickness on this sweater was much better than I anticipated for the price point. Very cute, oversized cut. I am true medium, but sized down to a small for a relaxed fit vs. oversized and it was the look I wanted. The thing I couldn’t make out from the pictures was that this sweater is a rib knit, but the body is a horizontal ribbing and vertical on the sleeves. I don’t know if that varies by color, but I thought it was worth mentioning. I got the classic black. Would recommend if you need an affordable, soft, medium lightweight sweater. Could easily pair with leggings, skirts or jeans. Read more
items.author: Brenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect chilly weather sweater
items.body: This oversized turtleneck is perfect for chilly days. I am always colder than anyone around me, and this is heavy enough a knit to really provide some comfort and soft enough to make me want to put it back on again soon. The turtle is HUGE - which is wonderful. The sleeves are long enough, and the length is just at the hip joint. I was a little worried because the video attached showed what amounted to a dress; I ordered to my size and it was perfect. Ordered the pink as well. Great buy in my book! Read more
items.author: Babi CJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally - a great sweater
items.body: This past Christmas I have been duped by ads that claim they sell a soft, comfortable, tunic length sweater and it has ticked me off BUT I am thrilled to report this sweater is a winner. And yeah, yeah...I'm one of those people who doesn't normally take time to write a review but this one warrants it. The material is soft: not like cashmere, but the fabric is smooth and pleasant to touch which is REALLY important when you're talking about a turtleneck. Who wants an itchy neck? NO ONE. It isn't super thick but frankly I think it's just the right weight plus I do think the fact that the neck is doubled up and stretchy to be comfortable while "snug" makes it cozy. I like that the upper arm is a little bigger (because um, I need that) while the forearms are stretchy but snug as I would prefer. It's just the right length in the front - as I prefer tunics - and it covers my butt when I wear leggings. The fit is a bit boxy, but with leggings, you've got a good silhouette going on plus people are tucking a section of their top into their pants so that will help if you want to go with that look. And can we talk color selection? OMG. I have a BAD Amazon shopping habit which I truly need to curb but I ended up getting this in navy and the hot pink and I am SO happy. The navy is the perfect shade of true navy (you know how some can be too dark, and others too washed out? I suspect this will hold its color really well). The hot pink is cheerful. These sweaters ARE going to get a lot of wear on hygge winter days in Ohio, and it is going to be hard not to scoop up another color....cuz when I find something I like, I tend to buy multiples, especially if the price is right, and the color selection here was killer. I work from home now and I just want to be snuggly when I do. Anyway, this is a winner. Go for it. Read more
items.author: Denise Silon Louie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Orange brighter than image.
items.body: Quality good for the price. Cute on. Soft! The orange is REALLY bright, not as rich as the photo, so it gets 3 stars. The model looks to be wearing a much larger sweater that her actual size. So if you want the same look, order a size up. I decided to keep it anyway because it was inexpensive and Halloween is coming up. Read more
items.author: Honest-D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lovely and reasonable sweater that would make a fabulous gift!
items.body: I love this slightly oversized turtleneck! I am a traditional size Large and this sweater’s measurements on the chart are accurate. I love that this sweater is offered in a range of colors. I chose the deep burgundy and may order another color. The quality and style are excellent and the price is so reasonable. Read more
items.author: SULU

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. Soft. Comfortable. There's an itchy tag on the side. I wear a cami or T shirt to block it. Only keeping the tag for washing instructions. Super cute and get lots of compliments. Read more
items.author: Garden Girl

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Forest Green, Nutmeg, Red/Green/Black, Apricot, Bright Orange, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Apricot, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
